projects: [{"title":"Research Assistant, XLRI Jamshedpur","start_date":"Jul 2015","description":"Conducting research about understanding sources of inspiration and motivation of BoP (Bottom of Pyramid) women to become entrepreneurAnalyzing data trends presented by Jascolampf (http://www.jascolampf.com/) to understand nature of support/resources/opportunities for underprivileged backgrounds or lower income families with limited access to education/work/opportunities."},{"title":"Study of Free Vibration Characteristics of Clamped-Clamped Timoshenko Beam","start_date":"Nov 2014","description":"The present paper deals with the determination of the natural frequencies of vibration of Timoshenko beam with classical approach by Eigen Value Analysis. A generalized solution is used to achieve the exact values of the frequencies and corresponding modeshapes The methodology is based upon converting the set of coupled differential equation into Eigen-value problem which is then solved in the usual manner using techniques of Linear Algebra."},{},{},{}]
